# archestra_sso_provider (Resource)

Manages an Archestra SSO Provider (OIDC or SAML).



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `domain` (String) The domain associated with this provider.
- `provider_id` (String) Unique identifier for the provider (e.g., 'okta', 'google').

### Optional

- `issuer` (String) The OIDC issuer URL.
- `oidc_config` (Attributes) Configuration for OIDC providers. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--oidc_config))
- `role_mapping` (Attributes) Role mapping configuration. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--role_mapping))
- `saml_config` (Attributes) Configuration for SAML providers. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--saml_config))
- `team_sync_config` (Attributes) Team synchronization configuration. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--team_sync_config))

### Read-Only

- `domain_verified` (Boolean) Whether the domain has been verified.
- `id` (String) Server-generated identifier for the provider.

<a id="nestedatt--oidc_config"></a>
### Nested Schema for `oidc_config`

Required:

- `client_id` (String) The client ID.
- `client_secret` (String, Sensitive) The client secret.
- `discovery_endpoint` (String) The OIDC discovery endpoint.
- `issuer` (String) The issuer URL.

Optional:

- `authorization_endpoint` (String) The authorization endpoint.
- `jwks_endpoint` (String) The JWKS endpoint.
- `mapping` (Attributes) Field mappings. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--oidc_config--mapping))
- `pkce` (Boolean) Enable PKCE.
- `scopes` (List of String) List of scopes.
- `token_endpoint` (String) The token endpoint.
- `user_info_endpoint` (String) The user info endpoint.

<a id="nestedatt--oidc_config--mapping"></a>
### Nested Schema for `oidc_config.mapping`

Optional:

- `email` (String)
- `email_verified` (String)
- `id` (String)
- `image` (String)
- `name` (String)



<a id="nestedatt--role_mapping"></a>
### Nested Schema for `role_mapping`

Optional:

- `default_role` (String) The default role to assign.
- `rules` (Attributes List) Role mapping rules. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--role_mapping--rules))
- `skip_role_sync` (Boolean) Skip role synchronization on login.
- `strict_mode` (Boolean) Enable strict mode (deny login if no rule matches).

<a id="nestedatt--role_mapping--rules"></a>
### Nested Schema for `role_mapping.rules`

Required:

- `expression` (String) Handlebars expression to match.
- `role` (String) The role to assign.



<a id="nestedatt--saml_config"></a>
### Nested Schema for `saml_config`

Required:

- `callback_url` (String) The callback URL (ACS URL).
- `cert` (String) The IdP certificate.
- `entry_point` (String) The SSO entry point.

Optional:

- `issuer` (String) The issuer.


<a id="nestedatt--team_sync_config"></a>
### Nested Schema for `team_sync_config`

Optional:

- `enabled` (Boolean) Enable team synchronization.
- `groups_expression` (String) Handlebars template to extract groups.
